blocks.content: Once your metrics are filtered, analyze the data to spot trends and correlations. Reviewing related metrics provides a broader understanding of your system's performance.
Review the panels and identify a metric of interest. Metrics that exhibit more change are more valuable to explore.

blocks.alt: Metrics Drilldown dashboards showing CPU performance

blocks.content: For a more detailed view of any metric, click **Select** in the visualization.
If necessary, use the **time picker** to adjust the time range.
Review the **Breakdown** tab to see time series visualizations for each label-value pair.
Review the **Related metrics** tab to see related metrics with relevant keywords.
